txt.en: 'I bet you're wondering how I got out here without getting all wet! I have secrets. Aye, I have some secrets.'
'I'm just sitting here. I might play my recorder later on, but for now I'm just sitting.'
'There's deer that sometimes come to drink here by the water. They come from clear over the other side of the valley.'
'I don't know what all the fuss is between us of Durin's folk and the Dourhands. Seems to me there's plenty of room for everyone.'
'This is the one thing I miss down in the mines...watching the sun and the moon cross the sky.'
